choose.when:
select * from cocktail_recipe where
cocktailAbv >= SUBSTRING_INDEX(#{tag}, '~', 1) and cocktailAbv <= SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(#{tag}, '~', 2), '~', -1)
cocktailMaterials like concat('%',#{tag}, '%')
order by cocktailNo asc limit #{skip},#{amount}

select count(*) from cocktail_recipe where
cocktailAbv >= SUBSTRING_INDEX(#{tag}, '~', 1) and cocktailAbv <= SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(#{tag}, '~', 2), '~', -1)
cocktailMaterials like concat('%',#{tag}, '%')
choose.otherwise:
select count(*) from cocktail_recipe
where cocktailName like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')

mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID();
insert into cocktail_recipe(cocktailName, cocktailMaterials, cocktailRecipes, cocktailAbv, cocktailLevel ,cocktailMbti, cocktailSeason) values(#{cocktailName}, #{cocktailMaterials}, #{cocktailRecipes}, #{cocktailAbv}, #{cocktailLevel}, #{cocktailMbti}, #{cocktailSeason} )
mapper.update: update cocktail_recipe set cocktailName=#{cocktailName}, cocktailMaterials=#{cocktailMaterials}, cocktailRecipes=#{cocktailRecipes}, cocktailAbv=#{cocktailAbv}, cocktailLevel=#{cocktailLevel}, cocktailMbti=#{cocktailMbti}, cocktailSeason=#{cocktailSeason} where cocktailNo = #{cocktailNo}
mapper.select: select cocktailNo, cocktailName from cocktail_recipe where cocktailNo = #{cocktailNo}
select cocktailNo, cocktailName, cocktailRating, cocktailLevel from cocktail_recipe order by cocktailRating desc limit 4
mapper.insert: insert into cocktail_image(cocktailNo, fileName, uploadPath, uuid) values (#{cocktailNo}, #{fileName}, #{uploadPath}, #{uuid})
mapper.select: select * from cocktail_image where uploadpath = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 DAY), '%Y\%m\%d')
